name: Horas
author: Giovanni Collazo @ Startups of Puerto Rico

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Comma separated values of the allowed hosts. Ei. 1hora.org,1hora.herokuapp.com

AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME.description: AWS bucket to save your static assets

BITLY_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Bitly access token. More info here https://support.bitly.com/hc/en-us/articles/230647907-How-do-I-find-my-OAuth-access-token-

DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL.description: Default email address to send notifications from

DISABLE_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Whether or not to disable Django's collectstatic command.

DJANGO_CONFIGURATION.description: App configuration environment: Development, Testing, or Production.

DJANGO_DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL.description: Default email address to send notifications from

DJANGO_EMAIL_HOST.description: URL for your prefered email provider.

DJANGO_EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD.description: Password for your user at your prefred email provider.

DJANGO_EMAIL_HOST_USER.description: User at your prefred email provider.

DJANGO_EMAIL_PORT.description: Port for your prefred email provider.

DJANGO_EMAIL_USE_TLS.description: Specify the use of TSL (encrypted communication) with your prefered email provider

DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE.description: Location of the project's Django settings

ENVIRONMENT.description: Current runtime environment. Production, Testing, or Development

HEAD_COMMIT_ID.description: Commit hash that you wish to use. This is primarily for caching.

HORAS_DEFAULT_TZ.description: Time zone for your instance. Ei. America/Puerto_Rico

SECRET_KEY.description: Your secret key. Be wise with this value it is used to provide cryptographic signing, and should be set to a unique, unpredictable value.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Twitter access token. More information here: https://dev.twitter.com/oauth/overview

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Your Twitter access token secret. More information here: https://dev.twitter.com/oauth/overview

TWITTER_API_KEY.description: Your Twitter API key. More information here: https://dev.twitter.com/oauth/overview

TWITTER_API_SECRET.description: Your Twitter API secret. More information here: https://dev.twitter.com/oauth/overview
